word-wrap: break-word !important; clear: both; min-height: 1em; white-space: pre-wrap; border: 0px;\">\r\n			<span style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\">一、标本类型错误率</span></p>\r\n	</blockquote>\r\n	<p style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important; clear: both; min-height: 1em; white-space: pre-wrap; color: rgb(62, 62, 62); background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255);\">\r\n		<span style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important; font-size: 14px;\">定义：类型不符合要求的标本数占同期标本总数的比例。 </span></p>\r\n	<p style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important; clear: both; min-height: 1em; white-space: pre-wrap; color: rgb(62, 62, 62); background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255);\">\r\n		<span style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important; font-size: 14px;\">计算公式：</span></p>\r\n	<p style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important; clear: both; min-height: 1em; white-space: pre-wrap; color: rgb(62, 62, 62); background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255);\">\r\n		<span style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important; font-size: 14px;\">标本类型错误率= &times;100%</span></p>\r\n	<p style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important; clear: both; min-height: 1em; white-space: pre-wrap; color: rgb(62, 62, 62); background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255);\">\r\n		<span style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important; font-size: 14px;\">意义：反映所采集标本的类型是否符合要求，是检验前的重要质量指标。标本类型符合要求是保证检验结果准确性的前提条件。</span></p>\r\n	<p style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important; clear: both; min-height: 1em; white-space: pre-wrap; color: rgb(62, 62, 62); background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255);\">\r\n		&nbsp;</p>\r\n	<blockquote style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 15px 25px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word; border-width: 0px 0px 0px 10px; border-left-style: solid; border-left-color: rgb(255, 96, 0); white-space: normal; color: rgb(68, 68, 68); font-family: 微软雅黑; top: 0px; font-size: 14px; vertical-align: baseline; background-color: rgb(239, 239, 239);\">\r\n		<p style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important; clear: both; min-height: 1em; white-space: pre-wrap; border: 0px;\">\r\n			<span style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\">二、标本容器错误率</span></p>\r\n	</blockquote>\r\n	<p style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important; clear: both; min-height: 1em; white-space: pre-wrap; color: rgb(62, 62, 62); background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255);\">\r\n		<span style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important; font-size: 14px;\">定义：采集容器不符合要求的标本数占同期标本总数的比例。</span></p>\r\n	<p style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important; clear: both; min-height: 1em; white-space: pre-wrap; color: rgb(62, 62, 62); background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255);\">\r\n		&nbsp;</p>\r\n	<p style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important; clear: both; min-height: 1em; white-space: pre-wrap; color: rgb(62, 62, 62); background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255);\">\r\n		<span style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important; font-size: 14px;\">计算公式：</span></p>\r\n	<p style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important; clear: both; min-height: 1em; white-space: pre-wrap; color: rgb(62, 62, 62); background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255);\">\r\n		<span style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important; font-size: 14px;\">标本容器错误率= &times;100%</span></p>\r\n	<p style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important; clear: both; min-height: 1em; white-space: pre-wrap; color: rgb(62, 62, 62); background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255);\">\r\n		<span style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important; font-size: 14px;\">意义：反映用于采集标本的容器是否符合要求，是检验前的重要质量指标。</span></p>\r\n	<blockquote style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 15px 25px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word; border-width: 0px 0px 0px 10px; border-left-style: solid; border-left-color: rgb(255, 96, 0); white-space: normal; color: rgb(68, 68, 68); font-family: 微软雅黑; top: 0px; font-size: 14px; vertical-align: baseline; background-color: rgb(239, 239, 239);\">\r\n		<p style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important; clear: both; min-height: 1em; white-space: pre-wrap; border: 0px;\">\r\n			<span style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\">三、标本采集量错误率</span></p>\r\n	</blockquote>\r\n	<p style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important; clear: both; min-height: 1em; white-space: pre-wrap; color: rgb(62, 62, 62); background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255);\">\r\n		<span style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important; font-size: 14px;\">定义：采集量不符合要求的标本数占同期标本总数的比例。</span></p>\r\n	<p style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important; clear: both; min-height: 1em; white-space: pre-wrap; color: rgb(62, 62, 62); background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255);\">\r\n		<span style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important; font-size: 14px;\">计算公式：</span></p>\r\n	<p style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important; clear: both; min-height: 1em; white-space: pre-wrap; color: rgb(62, 62, 62); background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255);\">\r\n		<span style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important; font-size: 14px;\">标本采集量错误率= &times;100%</span></p>\r\n	<p style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important; clear: both; min-height: 1em; white-space: pre-wrap; color: rgb(62, 62, 62); background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255);\">\r\n		<span style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important; font-size: 14px;\">意义：反映标本采集量是否正确，是检验前的重要质量指标。标本采集量不足或过多都可能影响检验结果。</span></p>\r\n	<p style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important; clear: both; min-height: 1em; white-space: pre-wrap; color: rgb(62, 62, 62); background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255);\">\r\n		&nbsp;</p>\r\n	<blockquote style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 15px 25px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word; border-width: 0px 0px 0px 10px; border-left-style: solid; border-left-color: rgb(255, 96, 0); white-space: normal; color: rgb(68, 68, 68); font-family: 微软雅黑; top: 0px; font-size: 14px; vertical-align: baseline; background-color: rgb(239, 239, 239);\">\r\n		<p style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important; clear: both; min-height: 1em; white-space: pre-wrap; border: 0px;\">\r\n			<span style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\">四、血培养污染率</span></p>\r\n	</blockquote>\r\n	<p style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important; clear: both; min-height: 1em; white-space: pre-wrap; color: rgb(62, 62, 62); background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255);\">\r\n		<span style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important; font-size: 14px;\">定义：污染的血培养标本数占同期血培养标本总数的比例。</span></p>\r\n	<p style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important; clear: both; min-height: 1em; white-space: pre-wrap; color: rgb(62, 62, 62); background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255);\">\r\n		<span style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important; font-size: 14px;\">计算公式：</span></p>\r\n	<p style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important; clear: both; min-height: 1em; white-space: pre-wrap; color: rgb(62, 62, 62); background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255);\">\r\n		<span style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important; font-size: 14px;\">血培养污染率= &times;100%</span></p>\r\n	<p style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important; clear: both; min-height: 1em; white-space: pre-wrap; color: rgb(62, 62, 62); background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255);\">\r\n		<span style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important; font-size: 14px;\">意义：反映血培养过程是否操作正确，是检验前的重要质量指标。</span></p>\r\n	<p style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important; clear: both; min-height: 1em; white-space: pre-wrap; color: rgb(62, 62, 62); background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255);\">\r\n		&nbsp;</p>\r\n	<blockquote style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 15px 25px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word; border-width: 0px 0px 0px 10px; border-left-style: solid; border-left-color: rgb(255, 96, 0); white-space: normal; color: rgb(68, 68, 68); font-family: 微软雅黑; top: 0px; font-size: 14px; vertical-align: baseline; background-color: rgb(239, 239, 239);\">\r\n		<p style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important; clear: both; min-height: 1em; white-space: pre-wrap; border: 0px;\">\r\n			<span style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\">五、抗凝标本凝集率</span></p>\r\n	</blockquote>\r\n	<p style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important; clear: both; min-height: 1em; white-space: pre-wrap; color: rgb(62, 62, 62); background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255);\">\r\n		<span style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important; font-size: 14px;\">定义：凝集的标本数占同期需抗凝的标本总数的比例。</span></p>\r\n	<p style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important; clear: both; min-height: 1em; white-space: pre-wrap; color: rgb(62, 62, 62); background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255);\">\r\n		<span style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important; font-size: 14px;\">计算公式：</span></p>\r\n	<p style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important; clear: both; min-height: 1em; white-space: pre-wrap; color: rgb(62, 62, 62); background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255);\">\r\n		<span style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important; font-size: 14px;\">抗凝标本凝集率= &times;100%</span></p>\r\n	<p style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important; clear: both; min-height: 1em; white-space: pre-wrap; color: rgb(62, 62, 62); background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255);\">\r\n		<span style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important; font-size: 14px;\">意义：反映标本采集过程抗凝剂是否正确使用的情况，是检验前的重要质量指标。</span></p>\r\n	<p style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important; clear: both; min-height: 1em; white-space: pre-wrap; color: rgb(62, 62, 62); background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255);\">\r\n		&nbsp;</p>\r\n	<blockquote style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 15px 25px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word; border-width: 0px 0px 0px 10px; border-left-style: solid; border-left-color: rgb(255, 96, 0); white-space: normal; color: rgb(68, 68, 68); font-family: 微软雅黑; top: 0px; font-size: 14px; vertical-align: baseline; background-color: rgb(239, 239, 239);\">\r\n		<p style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important; clear: both; min-height: 1em; white-space: pre-wrap; border: 0px;\">\r\n			<span style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\">六、检验前周转时间中位数</span></p>\r\n	</blockquote>\r\n	<p style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important; clear: both; min-height: 1em; white-space: pre-wrap; color: rgb(62, 62, 62); background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255);\">\r\n		<span style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important; font-size: 14px;\">定义：检验前周转时间是指从标本采集到实验室接收标本的时间（以分钟为单位）。检验前周转时间中位数，是指将检验前周转时间由长到短排序后取其中位数。</span></p>\r\n	<p style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important; clear: both; min-height: 1em; white-space: pre-wrap; color: rgb(62, 62, 62); background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255);\">\r\n		<span style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important; font-size: 14px;\">计算公式：</span></p>\r\n	<p style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important; clear: both; min-height: 1em; white-space: pre-wrap; color: rgb(62, 62, 62); background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255);\">\r\n		<span style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important; font-size: 14px;\">检验前周转时间中位数=X(n+1)/2, n 为奇数</span></p>\r\n	<p style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important; clear: both; min-height: 1em; white-space: pre-wrap; color: rgb(62, 62, 62); background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255);\">\r\n		<span style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important; font-size: 14px;\">检验前周转时间中位数=（Xn/2+Xn/2+1）/2，n为偶数</span></p>\r\n	<p style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important; clear: both; min-height: 1em; white-space: pre-wrap; color: rgb(62, 62, 62); background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255);\">\r\n		<span style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important; font-size: 14px;\">注：n为检验标本数，X为检验前周转时间。</span></p>\r\n	<p style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important; clear: both; min-height: 1em; white-space: pre-wrap; color: rgb(62, 62, 62); background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255);\">\r\n		<span style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important; font-size: 14px;\">意义：反映标本运送的及时性和效率，检验前周转时间是保证检验结果准确性和及时性的重要前提。</span></p>\r\n	<p style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important; clear: both; min-height: 1em; white-space: pre-wrap; color: rgb(62, 62, 62); background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255);\">\r\n		&nbsp;</p>\r\n	<blockquote style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 15px 25px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word; border-width: 0px 0px 0px 10px; border-left-style: solid; border-left-color: rgb(255, 96, 0); white-space: normal; color: rgb(68, 68, 68); font-family: 微软雅黑; top: 0px; font-size: 14px; vertical-align: baseline; background-color: rgb(239, 239, 239);\">\r\n		<p style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important; clear: both; min-height: 1em; white-space: pre-wrap; border: 0px;\">\r\n			<span style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\">七、室内质控项目开展率</span></p>\r\n	</blockquote>\r\n	<p style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important; clear: both; min-height: 1em; white-space: pre-wrap; color: rgb(62, 62, 62); background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255);\">\r\n		<span style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important; font-size: 14px;\">定义：开展室内质控的检验项目数占同期检验项目总数的比例。</span></p>\r\n	<p style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important; clear: both; min-height: 1em; white-space: pre-wrap; color: rgb(62, 62, 62); background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255);\">\r\n		<span style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important; font-size: 14px;\">计算公式：</span></p>\r\n	<p style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important; clear: both; min-height: 1em; white-space: pre-wrap; color: rgb(62, 62, 62); background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255);\">\r\n		<span style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important; font-size: 14px;\">= &times;100%</span></p>\r\n	<p style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important; clear: both; min-height: 1em; white-space: pre-wrap; color: rgb(62, 62, 62); background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255);\">\r\n		<span style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important; font-size: 14px;\">意义：反映实验室开展的检验项目中实施室内质控进行内部质量监测的覆盖度，是检验中的重要质量指标。</span></p>\r\n	<p style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important; clear: both; min-height: 1em; white-space: pre-wrap; color: rgb(62, 62, 62); background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255);\">\r\n		&nbsp;</p>\r\n	<blockquote style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 15px 25px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word; border-width: 0px 0px 0px 10px; border-left-style: solid; border-left-color: rgb(255, 96, 0); white-space: normal; color: rgb(68, 68, 68); font-family: 微软雅黑; top: 0px; font-size: 14px; vertical-align: baseline; background-color: rgb(239, 239, 239);\">\r\n		<p style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important; clear: both; min-height: 1em; white-space: pre-wrap; border: 0px;\">\r\n			<span style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\">八、室内质控项目变异系数不合格率</span></p>\r\n	</blockquote>\r\n	<p style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important; clear: both; min-height: 1em; white-space: pre-wrap; color: rgb(62, 62, 62); background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255);\">\r\n		<span style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important; font-size: 14px;\">定义：室内质控项目变异系数高于要求的检验项目数占同期对室内质控项目变异系数有要求的检验项目总数的比例。</span></p>\r\n	<p style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important; clear: both; min-height: 1em; white-space: pre-wrap; color: rgb(62, 62, 62); background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255);\">\r\n		&nbsp;</p>\r\n	<p style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important; clear: both; min-height: 1em; white-space: pre-wrap; color: rgb(62, 62, 62); background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255);\">\r\n		<span style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important; font-size: 14px;\">计算公式：</span></p>\r\n	<p style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important; clear: both; min-height: 1em; white-space: pre-wrap; color: rgb(62, 62, 62); background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255);\">\r\n		<span style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important; font-size: 14px;\">= &times;100%</span></p>\r\n	<p style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important; clear: both; min-height: 1em; white-space: pre-wrap; color: rgb(62, 62, 62); background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255);\">\r\n		<span style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important; font-size: 14px;\">意义：反映实验室检验结果精密度，是检验中的重要质量指标。</span></p>\r\n	<p style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important; clear: both; min-height: 1em; white-space: pre-wrap; color: rgb(62, 62, 62); background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255);\">\r\n		&nbsp;</p>\r\n	<blockquote style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 15px 25px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word; border-width: 0px 0px 0px 10px; border-left-style: solid; border-left-color: rgb(255, 96, 0); white-space: normal; color: rgb(68, 68, 68); font-family: 微软雅黑; top: 0px; font-size: 14px; vertical-align: baseline; background-color: rgb(239, 239, 239);\">\r\n		<p style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important; clear: both; min-height: 1em; white-space: pre-wrap; border: 0px;\">\r\n			<span style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\">九、室间质评项目参加率</span></p>\r\n	</blockquote>\r\n	<p style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important; clear: both; min-height: 1em; white-space: pre-wrap; color: rgb(62, 62, 62); background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255);\">\r\n		<span style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important; font-size: 14px;\">定义：参加室间质评的检验项目数占同期特定机构（国家、省级等）已开展的室间质评项目总数的比例。</span></p>\r\n	<p style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important; clear: both; min-height: 1em; white-space: pre-wrap; color: rgb(62, 62, 62); background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255);\">\r\n		<span style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important; font-size: 14px;\">计算公式：</span></p>\r\n	<p style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important; clear: both; min-height: 1em; white-space: pre-wrap; color: rgb(62, 62, 62); background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255);\">\r\n		<span style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important; font-size: 14px;\">= &times;100%</span></p>\r\n	<p style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important; clear: both; min-height: 1em; white-space: pre-wrap; color: rgb(62, 62, 62); background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255);\">\r\n		<span style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important; font-size: 14px;\">意义：反映实验室参加室间质评计划进行外部质量监测的情况，是检验中的重要质量指标。</span></p>\r\n	<p style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important; clear: both; min-height: 1em; white-space: pre-wrap; color: rgb(62, 62, 62); background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255);\">\r\n		&nbsp;</p>\r\n	<blockquote style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 15px 25px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word; border-width: 0px 0px 0px 10px; border-left-style: solid; border-left-color: rgb(255, 96, 0); white-space: normal; color: rgb(68, 68, 68); font-family: 微软雅黑; top: 0px; font-size: 14px; vertical-align: baseline; background-color: rgb(239, 239, 239);\">\r\n		<p style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important; clear: both; min-height: 1em; white-space: pre-wrap; border: 0px;\">\r\n			<span style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\">十、室间质评项目不合格率</span></p>\r\n	</blockquote>\r\n	<p style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important; clear: both; min-height: 1em; white-space: pre-wrap; color: rgb(62, 62, 62); background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255);\">\r\n		<span style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important; font-size: 14px;\">定义：室间质评不合格的检验项目数占同期参加室间质评检验项目总数的比例。</span></p>\r\n	<p style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important; clear: both; min-height: 1em; white-space: pre-wrap; color: rgb(62, 62, 62); background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255);\">\r\n		&nbsp;</p>\r\n	<p style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important; clear: both; min-height: 1em; white-space: pre-wrap; color: rgb(62, 62, 62); background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255);\">\r\n		<span style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important; font-size: 14px;\">计算公式：</span></p>\r\n	<p style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important; clear: both; min-height: 1em; white-space: pre-wrap; color: rgb(62, 62, 62); background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255);\">\r\n		<span style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important; font-size: 14px;\">= &times;100%</span></p>\r\n	<p style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important; clear: both; min-height: 1em; white-space: pre-wrap; color: rgb(62, 62, 62); background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255);\">\r\n		<span style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important; font-size: 14px;\">意义：反映实验室参加室间质评计划的合格情况，是检验中的重要质量指标。</span></p>\r\n	<p style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important; clear: both; min-height: 1em; white-space: pre-wrap; color: rgb(62, 62, 62); background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255);\">\r\n		&nbsp;</p>\r\n	<blockquote style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 15px 25px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word; border-width: 0px 0px 0px 10px; border-left-style: solid; border-left-color: rgb(255, 96, 0); white-space: normal; color: rgb(68, 68, 68); font-family: 微软雅黑; top: 0px; font-size: 14px; vertical-align: baseline; background-color: rgb(239, 239, 239);\">\r\n		<p style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important; clear: both; min-height: 1em; white-space: pre-wrap; border: 0px;\">\r\n			<span style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\">十一、实验室间比对率（用于无室间质评计划检验项目）</span></p>\r\n	</blockquote>\r\n	<p style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important; clear: both; min-height: 1em; white-space: pre-wrap; color: rgb(62, 62, 62); background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255);\">\r\n		<span style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important; font-size: 14px;\">定义：执行实验室间比对的检验项目数占同期无室间质评计划检验项目总数的比例。</span></p>\r\n	<p style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important; clear: both; min-height: 1em; white-space: pre-wrap; color: rgb(62, 62, 62); background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255);\">\r\n		<span style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important; font-size: 14px;\">计算公式：</span></p>\r\n	<p style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important; clear: both; min-height: 1em; white-space: pre-wrap; color: rgb(62, 62, 62); background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255);\">\r\n		<span style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important; font-size: 14px;\">= &times;100%</span></p>\r\n	<p style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important; clear: both; min-height: 1em; white-space: pre-wrap; color: rgb(62, 62, 62); background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255);\">\r\n		<span style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important; font-size: 14px;\">意义：反映无室间质评计划的检验项目中实施实验室间比对的情况，是检验中的重要质量指标。</span></p>\r\n	<p style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important; clear: both; min-height: 1em; white-space: pre-wrap; color: rgb(62, 62, 62); background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255);\">\r\n		&nbsp;</p>\r\n	<blockquote style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 15px 25px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word; border-width: 0px 0px 0px 10px; border-left-style: solid; border-left-color: rgb(255, 96, 0); white-space: normal; color: rgb(68, 68, 68); font-family: 微软雅黑; top: 0px; font-size: 14px; vertical-align: baseline; background-color: rgb(239, 239, 239);\">\r\n		<p style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important; clear: both; min-height: 1em; white-space: pre-wrap; border: 0px;\">\r\n			<span style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\">十二、实验室内周转时间中位数</span></p>\r\n	</blockquote>\r\n	<p style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important; clear: both; min-height: 1em; white-space: pre-wrap; color: rgb(62, 62, 62); background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255);\">\r\n		<span style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important; font-size: 14px;\">定义：实验室内周转时间是指从实验室收到标本到发送报告的时间（以分钟为单位）。实验室内周转时间中位数，是指将实验室内周转时间由长到短排序后取其中位数。</span></p>\r\n	<p style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important; clear: both; min-height: 1em; white-space: pre-wrap; color: rgb(62, 62, 62); background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255);\">\r\n		<span style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important; font-size: 14px;\">计算公式：</span></p>\r\n	<p style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important; clear: both; min-height: 1em; white-space: pre-wrap; color: rgb(62, 62, 62); background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255);\">\r\n		<span style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important; font-size: 14px;\">实验室内周转时间中位数=X(n+1)/2, n 为奇数</span></p>\r\n	<p style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important; clear: both; min-height: 1em; white-space: pre-wrap; color: rgb(62, 62, 62); background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255);\">\r\n		<span style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important; font-size: 14px;\">实验室内周转时间中位数=（Xn/2+Xn/2+1）/2，n为偶数</span></p>\r\n	<p style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important; clear: both; min-height: 1em; white-space: pre-wrap; color: rgb(62, 62, 62); background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255);\">\r\n		<span style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important; font-size: 14px;\">注：n为检验标本数，X为实验室内周转时间。</span></p>\r\n	<p style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important; clear: both; min-height: 1em; white-space: pre-wrap; color: rgb(62, 62, 62); background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255);\">\r\n		<span style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important; font-size: 14px;\">意义：反映实验室工作效率，是实验室可控的检验中和检验后的重要质量指标。</span></p>\r\n	<p style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important; clear: both; min-height: 1em; white-space: pre-wrap; color: rgb(62, 62, 62); background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255);\">\r\n		&nbsp;</p>\r\n	<blockquote style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 15px 25px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word; border-width: 0px 0px 0px 10px; border-left-style: solid; border-left-color: rgb(255, 96, 0); white-space: normal; color: rgb(68, 68, 68); font-family: 微软雅黑; top: 0px; font-size: 14px; vertical-align: baseline; background-color: rgb(239, 239, 239);\">\r\n		<p style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important; clear: both; min-height: 1em; white-space: pre-wrap; border: 0px;\">\r\n			<span style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\">十三、检验报告不正确率</span></p>\r\n	</blockquote>\r\n	<p style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important; clear: both; min-height: 1em; white-space: pre-wrap; color: rgb(62, 62, 62); background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255);\">\r\n		<span style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important; font-size: 14px;\">定义：检验报告不正确是指实验室已发出的报告，其内容与实际情况不相符，包括结果不正确、患者信息不正确、标本信息不正确等。检验报告不正确率是指实验室发出的不正确检验报告数占同期检验报告总数的比例。</span></p>\r\n	<p style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important; clear: both; min-height: 1em; white-space: pre-wrap; color: rgb(62, 62, 62); background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255);\">\r\n		&nbsp;</p>\r\n	<p style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important; clear: both; min-height: 1em; white-space: pre-wrap; color: rgb(62, 62, 62); background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255);\">\r\n		<span style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important; font-size: 14px;\">计算公式：</span></p>\r\n	<p style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important; clear: both; min-height: 1em; white-space: pre-wrap; color: rgb(62, 62, 62); background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255);\">\r\n		<span style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important; font-size: 14px;\">= &times;100%</span></p>\r\n	<p style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important; clear: both; min-height: 1em; white-space: pre-wrap; color: rgb(62, 62, 62); background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255);\">\r\n		<span style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important; font-size: 14px; color: rgb(0, 0, 0);\">意义：反映实验室检验报告正确性，是检验后的重要质量指标。</span></p>\r\n	<p style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important; clear: both; min-height: 1em; white-space: pre-wrap; color: rgb(62, 62, 62); background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255);\">\r\n		&nbsp;</p>\r\n	<blockquote style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 15px 25px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word; border-width: 0px 0px 0px 10px; border-left-style: solid; border-left-color: rgb(255, 96, 0); white-space: normal; color: rgb(68, 68, 68); font-family: 微软雅黑; top: 0px; font-size: 14px; vertical-align: baseline; background-color: rgb(239, 239, 239);\">\r\n		<p style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important; clear: both; min-height: 1em; white-space: pre-wrap; border: 0px;\">\r\n			<span style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\">十四、危急值通报率</span></p>\r\n	</blockquote>\r\n	<p style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important; clear: both; min-height: 1em; white-space: pre-wrap; color: rgb(62, 62, 62); background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255);\">\r\n		<span style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important; font-size: 14px;\">定义：危急值是指除外检查仪器或试剂等技术原因出现的表明患者可能正处于生命危险的边缘状态，必须立刻进行记录并第一时间报告给该患者主管医师的检验结果。危急值通报率是指已通报的危急值检验项目数占同期需要通报的危急值检验项目总数的比例。</span></p>\r\n	<p style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important; clear: both; min-height: 1em; white-space: pre-wrap; color: rgb(62, 62, 62); background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255);\">\r\n		&nbsp;</p>\r\n	<p style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important; clear: both; min-height: 1em; white-space: pre-wrap; color: rgb(62, 62, 62); background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255);\">\r\n		<span style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important; font-size: 14px;\">计算公式：</span></p>\r\n	<p style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important; clear: both; min-height: 1em; white-space: pre-wrap; color: rgb(62, 62, 62); background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255);\">\r\n		<span style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important; font-size: 14px;\">= &times;100%</span></p>\r\n	<p style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important; clear: both; min-height: 1em; white-space: pre-wrap; color: rgb(62, 62, 62); background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255);\">\r\n		<span style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important; font-size: 14px;\">意义：反映危急值通报情况，是检验后的重要质量指标。</span></p>\r\n	<p style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important; clear: both; min-height: 1em; white-space: pre-wrap; color: rgb(62, 62, 62); background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255);\">\r\n		&nbsp;</p>\r\n	<blockquote style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 15px 25px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word; border-width: 0px 0px 0px 10px; border-left-style: solid; border-left-color: rgb(255, 96, 0); white-space: normal; color: rgb(68, 68, 68); font-family: 微软雅黑; top: 0px; font-size: 14px; vertical-align: baseline; background-color: rgb(239, 239, 239);\">\r\n		<p style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important; clear: both; min-height: 1em; white-space: pre-wrap; border: 0px;\">\r\n			<span style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\">十五、危急值通报及时率</span></p>\r\n	</blockquote>\r\n	<p style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important; clear: both; min-height: 1em; white-space: pre-wrap; color: rgb(62, 62, 62); background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255);\">\r\n		<span style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important; font-size: 14px;\">定义：危急值通报时间（从结果确认到与临床医生交流的时间）符合规定时间的检验项目数占同期需要危急值通报的检验项目总数的比例。</span></p>\r\n	<p style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important; clear: both; min-height: 1em; white-space: pre-wrap; color: rgb(62, 62, 62); background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255);\">\r\n		&nbsp;</p>\r\n	<p style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important; clear: both; min-height: 1em; white-space: pre-wrap; color: rgb(62, 62, 62); background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255);\">\r\n		<span style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important; font-size: 14px;\">计算公式：</span></p>\r\n	<p style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important; clear: both; min-height: 1em; white-space: pre-wrap; color: rgb(62, 62, 62); background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255);\">\r\n		<span style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important; font-size: 14px;\">= &times;100%</span></p>\r\n	<p style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important; clear: both; min-height: 1em; white-space: pre-wrap; color: rgb(62, 62, 62); background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255);\">\r\n		<span style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important; font-size: 14px;\">意义：反映危急值通报是否及时，是检验后的重要质量指标。</span></p>\r\n	<p style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important; clear: both; min-height: 1em; white-space: pre-wrap;\">\r\n		&nbsp;</p>\r\n	<p style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important; clear: both; min-height: 1em; white-space: pre-wrap;\">\r\n		来源：检验医学网</p>\r\n</div>\r\n<div class=\"rich_media_tool\" id=\"js_toobar3\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 15px 0px 0px; font-size: 14px; overflow: hidden; line-height: 32px; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-family: \'Hiragino Sans GB\', \'Microsoft YaHei\', Arial, sans-serif; font-style: normal; font-variant: normal; font-weight: normal; letter-spacing: normal; orphans: auto; text-align: start; text-indent: 0px; text-transform: none; white-space: normal; widows: 1; word-spacing: 0px; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px;\">\r\n	&nbsp;</div>\r\n','','','119.136.153.76');
INSERT INTO `dede_addonarticle` VALUES('81','7','<strong>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; 作者：李超</strong>\r\n<div>\r\n	<strong>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; 2016年9月，我代表维润赛润生物技术（深圳）有限公司参加了在德国维尔茨堡，由维润赛润总部Institut Virion\\Serion GmbH主办的国际脑脊液学术研讨会。本次会议各国参会者人数众多，大多来自欧洲各个国家的从业医师和神经疾病科学领域的学者，而我有幸作为唯一一个亚洲代表全程参与学习了此次大会。</strong></div>\r\n<div style=\"text-align: center;\">\r\n	<strong><img alt=\"\" src=\"/uploads/allimg/161028/1-16102Q0435X24.png\" style=\"width: 293px; height: 296px;\" /></strong></div>\r\n&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; 2016年9月13-14日两天的大会全程由Hansotto Reiber教授主持。自1891年德国医生Quincke教授首次采用腰椎穿刺获取并分析脑脊液成分起，脑脊液诊断已历经120余年，由于其测量方法学的精确性和覆盖参数的广泛度，在确定中枢神经系统疾病的病因上至今仍然无法被其它技术所取代。Reiber教授是脑脊液诊断以及神经生物学领域的顶尖学者，究其一生的研究成果，到目前为止发表了200多篇学术论文，编辑或参与出版了多部相关领域的学术著作，改进了初始定性式的脑脊液诊断报告图表，创造性的发展了基于对鞘内合成抗体进行定量检测的Reiber图表（Reiber Diagram）诊断报告，为中枢神经系统疾病的脑脊液精确诊断做出了巨大的贡献，使得大量的医师和病人从中受益。正是因为脑脊液诊断无可比拟的重要性，维润赛润德国总部聘请了Reiber教授作为专家顾问，以Reiber教授的研究成果为基础，依照德国脑脊液诊断与临床神经化学协会的指导意见，开发了脑脊液抗体诊断试剂盒和AI质控品等系列产品，并注重和ELISA系列产品的试剂兼容性，使得客户能够准确、经济、便捷的进行脑脊液抗体定量，辅助完成高质量的脑脊液诊断报告。\r\n<div style=\"text-align: center;\">\r\n	<img alt=\"\" src=\"/uploads/allimg/161028/1-16102Q04429540.png\" style=\"width: 346px; height: 185px;\" /></div>\r\n&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; 第一天，Reiber教授作了《脑脊液空间和脑脊液流动的解剖学、生理学与生物物理学》、《神经免疫学基础、分析和解读》和《脑脊液数据综合报告-疾病相关模式》的专项讲座。Spreer博士结合自己诊所的诊断经历，作了题为《神经系统疾病的鉴别诊断-我们能够从脑脊液分析结果中得到什么信息？神经病学家希望知道什么？》的脑脊液诊断实用报告。而来自捷克布拉格脑脊液、神经免疫学、病原学和特殊诊断实验室负责人的Sobek博士则从细胞学诊断的角度作了《脑脊液细胞学-方法、基本细胞类型和炎症疾病案例》的专题演讲。一整天的会议安排紧凑而又内容丰富，与会者与演讲人的互动频繁而又专业，晚宴安排在美茵河边上的玛利亚城堡上，城堡依山而建，气势恢宏而又古朴俊美，俯瞰着整条美茵河，美不胜收，让身在其中的游客叹为观止以至流连忘返。\r\n<div style=\"text-align: center;\">\r\n	<img alt=\"\" src=\"/uploads/allimg/161028/1-16102Q04510V4.png\" style=\"width: 461px; height: 297px;\" /><img alt=\"\" height=\"294\" src=\"/uploads/allimg/161028/1-16102Q04524K6.png\" width=\"466\" /></div>\r\n&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; 第二天，Reiber教授依然是贯穿整个会议的主导者，穿插在各位主讲人之间串联他们的研究成果以及作必要的点评和对听众的提问作辅助回答。除了Reiber教授讲课以外，来自乌尔姆大学的临床神经病学家Otto教授作了题为《神经退行性疾病实验室诊断中的实用神经化学标志物的研究进展》的报告，德国总部的Rosenstock博士介绍了基于Reiber教授研究成果的维润脑脊液抗体诊断产品的特点和实用操作要点，以及来自荷兰与法国等国家的同行介绍了脑脊液诊断项目在各自实验室的进展状况和所面临的关键问题。大会在问答环节中结束。会议结束后，一部分已报名的人员留下来接受了Reiber教授团队所开发的脑脊液辅助诊断程序的使用教程培训。<br />\r\n<div style=\"text-align: center;\">\r\n	&nbsp;<img alt=\"\" src=\"/uploads/allimg/161028/1-16102Q04559153.png\" style=\"width: 251px; height: 302px;\" /></div>\r\n&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; 对比之前在国内所做的相关领域现状调查，这次参会使我体会到国内乃至整个发展中国家脑脊液诊断和欧美发达国家之间的差距，增强了对维润赛润脑脊液抗体诊断产品的信心，并且坚定了我将基于Reiber图表的整套诊断方法引进至国内的信念，使之造福于国内广大中枢神经系统疾病的患者与医师。<br />\r\n&nbsp;','','','119.136.155.211');

white-space: normal; color: rgb(62, 62, 62); font-family: \'Hiragino Sans GB\', \'Microsoft YaHei\', Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 16px; font-style: normal; font-variant: normal; font-weight: normal; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important; list-style: none; font-size: 14px; font-family: normal; line-height: 22.390625px; background-color: rgb(251, 253, 255);\">一个病人的苦恼：&ldquo;为什么几家医院检查不同结果，我相信谁？现在检查很多，价钱都很贵，实在承受不了，无奈！希望遇到一个好大夫，把我的病诊断清楚，早日治好，这是全家最幸福的事&rdquo;.</span></p>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 0px;
